refnamediv.refpurpose: Parse input string according to pattern

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
Object oriented style
MessageFormatter
array parse stringvalue
Procedural style
array msgfmt_parse MessageFormatterfmt stringvalue
Parses input string and return any extracted items as an array.

&reftitle.parameters;
fmt
The message formatter
value
The string to parse

&reftitle.returnvalues;
An array containing the items extracted, or &false; on error
